name: Cursed Burial Grounds
description:
You crash your car after seeing something. You are a soldier that was heading to the last known location of some soldiers. You get out of your crashed car to find a dead soldier of the entrance of a, cursed graveyard. The soldier left a note informing you of a piece of what happened and about the others inside.  Maybe if you find all the other soldiers notes you will have a complete picture of what happened. 

You take out a rifle, pistol and 3 grenades, who knows what's out there.

Controls

1= pistol   2=rifle   G= grenades    Shift= Sprint     SPACE= Jump

Options in options menu is disabled, sorry didn't get to that.

This game is for win64

Let me know what you think, this is my first jam so there is bound to be bugs.
